name: Cats, Bombs and Fireworks
description:
Note - To make sure all the UI isn't messed up press the fullscreen button.

The aim of the game is to create as much chaos as possible. Collect items and throw them at civilians to startle them. Use the WASD keys to move. Watch out for the animal control. If you get too close they will catch you.

I hope you enjoy my game, I'm aware that there are a few glitches. So feel free to make suggestions. I plan on continuing the game once the game jam is over.
